page.title: 20CREDITS FOR DACRE.
page.content: The work on Dacre was carried out by children from Stainton Church of England School headed by Mr.I.D.Graham,assisted by Mrs.M.B.Findlay and the following pupils:- B.WILLIAMSON S.PARKER J.DIXON B.COOPER M.GRAHAM B.TAYLOR T.HARRISON J.WILLAN S.THOMLINSON S.MACFARLANE E.SIMPSON S.THOMPSON E.WATSON S.STODDART D.TAYLOR A.ARMSTRONG A.JACKSON K.PYMAN S.STALKER C.BAKER S.GEER C.WATSON P.JACKSON S.ABBOTT K.BRUNDRETT N.BELL S.BATHAM M.DODD C.ELLISON J.THORNELEY J.BARR R.FISHER R.DALTON R.STODDART S.BELL M.BLAND D.BAGLEE M.FEARS T.PURDHAM M.STRONG J.HATTON S.KERR J.DAWES G.MAY S.BALMER p.FLEMING A.SMITH D.BIBBY W.SMITH Z.GREIG and many parents,friends and residents of the area.
